tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  GET READY TO READ
comments: Very unreliable. You can\'t count on her syllabus. She\'ll say one thing then change it. She\'s unclear and will take ages to respond e-mail. As far as actual work-load, its fairly easy. But this class definitely frustrated me various times.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: One of the most amazing professors that i\'ve ever had. She teaches you so much about special Ed and has a heart of gold. You will learn so much not only from the book and videos, but also from many of her real-life anecdotes that are a result of her many years of experience in this field. Take her class. :)

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: great class! count on real life examples and stories in class all the time. super nice and funny lady. make sure to show up - she has a bunch of videos and you write short responses to them, along with quickwrites about the textbook chapters sometimes. i learned sooo much about special education. i would recommend julie denmion to anyone!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She is a GREAT teacher and person over all. Her enthusiasm and overall care for special ed students is contagious and makes you want to have a heart as big as hers. LOVED her class. (and she is funny too!)
